ygData.msgSnippet: As NIGHTSHIFT skulked down the hall, the sounds of the voices were getting louder. “That’s it.” said one voice. “We almost have what we came for.”

As NIGHTSHIFT skulked down the hall, the sounds of the voices were
getting =
louder.

=93That=92s it.=94 said one voice. =93We almost have what we came =
for.=94

Another voice spoke, =93Almost, but we still need a specimen for o=
ur study.=94

There was a chuckle and then the first voice spoke again, =93=
Ahh, we
have one on the way even now.=94 There was a pause and then the voi=
ce
continued, =93I think it has only now began to suspect the trap that
awa=
its it.=94

Even as NIGHTSHIFT heard those words there was a rumbling sound=
 in the
hall that he was in and then twin portcullises began to swing down,=

one at each end of the tunnel that he was in.

(TAG)

- Preston
